mapper.select:
SELECT i.fid,i.fname,count(w.fid) total FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine w ON w.finsframework_id=i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE i.FTYPE = 23
and (i.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname

select.if:
SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(t.total) total,sum(t.fworktime) worktime,sum(t.electricity) electricity,sum(t.voltage) voltage FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.fid,i.fname,count(DISTINCT w.fid) total,i.FPARENT,sum(DISTINCT wk.fworktime) fworktime,avg(wk.felectricity) electricity, avg(wk.fvoltage) voltage FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine w ON w.finsframework_id = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_work wk ON wk.FMACHINE_ITEMID = i.fid
and wk.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,count(DISTINCT w.fid) total,i.FPARENT,sum(DISTINCT wk.fworktime) worktime,avg(wk.felectricity) electricity, avg(wk.fvoltage) voltage FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine w ON w.finsframework_id = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_work wk ON wk.FMACHINE_ITEMID = i.fid
and wk.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(t.total) total,sum(t.num) num FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.fid,i.fname,count(DISTINCT w.fid) total,i.FPARENT,COUNT(DISTINCT wk.FMACHINE_ID) num FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine w ON w.finsframework_id = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_work wk ON wk.FMACHINE_ITEMID = i.fid
and wk.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,count(DISTINCT w.fid) total,i.FPARENT,COUNT(DISTINCT wk.FMACHINE_ID) num FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine w ON w.finsframework_id = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_work wk ON wk.FMACHINE_ITEMID = i.fid
and wk.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT w.FMACHINE_ID) num FROM tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
AND FSTARTTIME >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(DISTINCT(fmachine_id)) machinenum from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime

select count(fjunction_id) junctionnum from( select fjunction_id from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fjunction_id != 0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fmachine_id = #{dto.machineid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime
union select fjunction_id from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fjunction_id != 0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fmachine_id = #{dto.machineid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime
)temp

select count(fjunction_id) junctionnum from( select fjunction_id from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fjunction_id != 0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_no = #{dto.welderno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
union select fjunction_id from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fjunction_id != 0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_no = #{dto.welderno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)temp

select sum(num) from( select sum(fworktime) num from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
AND w.fmachine_id = #{dto.machineid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime
UNION ALL select sum(fstandbytime) num from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
AND w.fmachine_id = #{dto.machineid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime
)temp

select sum(num) from( select sum(fworktime) num from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fjunction_no = #{dto.junctionno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
UNION ALL select sum(fstandbytime) num from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fjunction_no = #{dto.junctionno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
UNION ALL select sum(fwarntime) num from tb_warn w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where w.fstatus !=99
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fjunction_no = #{dto.junctionno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)temp

select sum(num) from( select sum(fworktime) num from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_id = #{dto.personid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
UNION ALL select sum(fstandbytime) num from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_id = #{dto.personid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
UNION ALL select sum(fwarntime) num from tb_warn w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where w.fstatus !=99
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_id = #{dto.personid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)temp
SELECT fwire_weight, fspeed, fair_flow_volume, fstandby_power from tb_parameter

select sum(fstandbytime) worktime from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fmachine_id = #{dto.machineid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime

select sum(fstandbytime) worktime from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_id = #{dto.personid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select sum(fstandbytime) worktime from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fjunction_no = #{dto.junctionno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT avg(felectricity) electricity,avg(fvoltage) voltage,sum(fworktime) worktime,
sum((w.fworktime*w.fwirefeedrate*m.fcoefficient)/60) wirefeedrate FROM tb_work w LEFT JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel WHERE 1=1
AND w.fmachine_id = #{dto.machineid}
AND w.FSTARTTIME >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and w.FENDTIME <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT sum(electricity) electricity,sum(voltage) voltage,sum(worktime) worktime,sum(wirefeedrate) wirefeedrate,sum(time) time from ( select avg(felectricity) electricity,avg(fvoltage) voltage,sum(fworktime) worktime,sum((w.fworktime*w.fwirefeedrate*m.fcoefficient)/60) wirefeedrate,0 time from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_id = #{dto.personid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
union all select 0 electricity,0 voltage,0 worktime,sum((w.falarmtime*w.fwirefeedrate*m.fcoefficient)/60) wirefeedrate,sum(falarmtime) time from tb_alarm w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fwelder_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel where 1=1 and fstatus=99
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fwelder_id = #{dto.personid}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)temp

SELECT sum(electricity) electricity,sum(voltage) voltage,sum(worktime) worktime,sum(time) time from ( select avg(felectricity) electricity,avg(fvoltage) voltage,sum(fworktime) worktime,0 time from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fjunction_no = #{dto.junctionno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
union all select 0 electricity,0 voltage,0 worktime,sum(falarmtime) time from tb_alarm w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fjunction_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fjunction_no = #{dto.junctionno}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)temp

SELECT m.fid,m.fequipment_no fname,i.fid insid,i.fname insname FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = m.finsframework_id left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where i.ftype=23
and (i.fid=#{item} or ins.fid=#{item} or insf.fid=#{item} or insf.fparent=#{item})

SELECT i.fid,i.fname FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1 = 1
and (i.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})

select fname,sum(insid) insid,sum(hour) worktime from( select j.fid,j.fname, 0 insid, 0 hour from tb_insframework j LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE j.ftype=23
and (j.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
union all SELECT j.fid, j.fname insname,SUM(a.fworktime) insid, 0 hour FROM tb_insframework j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE j.ftype=23
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (j.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
GROUP BY j.fid, j.fname UNION ALL SELECT j.fid, j.fname insname, 0 insid,SUM(a.fworktime) hour FROM tb_insframework j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.FWELDER_ITEMID LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE j.ftype=23 and a.fstatus=99 and a.FWPS_LIB_ID > 0
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (j.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
GROUP BY j.fid, j.fname )temp group by fname order by fname

select * from ( select i.fid,i.fname,SUM(w.falarmtime) insid from tb_insframework i inner join tb_alarm w on w.fmachine_itemid=i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where i.ftype=23
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and w.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
group by i.fid,i.fname UNION ALL select i.fid,i.fname,0 insid from tb_insframework i inner JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent inner JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where i.ftype=23
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
and i.fid not in (select i.fid from tb_insframework i inner join tb_alarm w on w.fmachine_itemid=i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where i.ftype=23
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and w.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
group by i.fid ) )temp

select fequipment_no insname,fname,sum(insid) insid,sum(hour) worktime from( select j.fid,j.fequipment_no,i.fname, 0 insid, 0 hour from tb_welding_machine j INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.finsframework_id LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
union all SELECT j.fid, j.fequipment_no,i.fname,SUM(a.fworktime) insid, 0 hour FROM tb_welding_machine j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.finsframework_id LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY j.fid,j.fequipment_no,i.fname UNION ALL SELECT j.fid, j.fequipment_no,i.fname, 0 insid,SUM(a.fworktime) hour FROM tb_welding_machine j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.finsframework_id LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1 and a.fstatus=99
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY j.fid, j.fequipment_no,i.fname )temp group by fid,fequipment_no,fname order by fid

select * from ( SELECT m.fequipment_no fname,i.fname insname,SUM(w.falarmtime) insid FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = m.finsframework_id LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent INNER JOIN tb_alarm w ON w.fmachine_id=m.fid where 1=1
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and w.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY m.fid UNION ALL SELECT m.fequipment_no fname,i.fname insname,0 insid FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = m.finsframework_id LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and m.fid NOT IN (SELECT m.fid FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = m.finsframework_id INNER JOIN tb_alarm w ON w.fmachine_id=m.fid where 1=1
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and w.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY m.fid ) )temp

select insname,fname,sum(insid) insid,sum(hour) worktime from ( select j.fid,j.fwelder_no insname,j.fname, 0 insid, 0 hour from tb_welder j INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.Fowner LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
union all SELECT j.fid, j.fwelder_no insname,j.fname,SUM(a.fworktime) insid, 0 hour FROM tb_welder j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.fwelder_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.Fowner LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
GROUP BY j.fid,j.fwelder_no,j.fname UNION ALL SELECT j.fid, j.fwelder_no insname,j.fname, 0 insid,SUM(a.fworktime) hour FROM tb_welder j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.fwelder_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.Fowner LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1 and a.fstatus=99
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
GROUP BY j.fid,j.fwelder_no,j.fname )temp group by fid,insname,fname order by fid

select * from ( SELECT w.fwelder_no insname,w.fname,SUM(a.falarmtime) insid FROM tb_welder w inner join tb_alarm a on a.fwelder_id=w.fid inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.Fowner left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
GROUP BY w.fid UNION ALL SELECT w.fwelder_no insname,w.fname,0 insid FROM tb_welder w inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.Fowner left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
and w.fid NOT IN ( SELECT w.fid FROM tb_welder w inner join tb_alarm a on a.fwelder_id=w.fid inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.Fowner left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
GROUP BY w.fid ) )temp

select * from ( SELECT j.fwelded_junction_no insname,SUM(a.falarmtime) insid FROM tb_welded_junction j INNER JOIN tb_alarm a ON j.fid=a.fjunction_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.fitemId LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
and j.fwelded_junction_no like #{junctionno}
GROUP BY j.fid UNION ALL SELECT j.fwelded_junction_no insname,0 insid FROM tb_welded_junction j INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = j.fitemId LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
and j.fid NOT IN ( SELECT fjunction_id FROM tb_alarm l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fjunction_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fstarttime < to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
and fjunction_no like #{junctionno}
GROUP BY fjunction_id)
and j.fwelded_junction_no like #{junctionno}
)temp

SELECT m.fid,m.fequipment_no fname,i.fname insname,d.fvaluename,sum(fwarntime) num FROM tb_warn l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m on m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = l.fstatus where d.ftypeid=15
and d.fvalue=#{value}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{dto.parent} or ins.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fid=#{dto.parent} or insf.fparent=#{dto.parent})
group by m.fid,d.fvalue

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT l.fwelder_id,w.FNAME,w.FWELDER_NO welderno,i.fname insname,SUM(fworktime)/3600 hour FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welder w ON l.FWELDER_ID = w.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.FOWNER WHERE l.fjunction_id > 0
and l.fstarttime >= to_date(#{time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and l.fendtime <= to_date(#{time2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND i.FPARENT = #{parent}
GROUP BY l.fwelder_id,w.FNAME,w.FWELDER_NO,i.fname ORDER BY hour DESC ) WHERE 7 >= ROWNUM

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.FWELDER_ID) num FROM tb_standby s left join TB_INSFRAMEWORK i on i.fid = s.FWELDER_ITEMID WHERE 1 = 1
AND (FWELDER_ITEMID = #{itemid} or i.FPARENT = #{itemid})
AND s.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.FWELDER_ID) num FROM tb_standby s left join TB_INSFRAMEWORK i on i.fid = s.FWELDER_ITEMID WHERE 1 = 1
AND (FWELDER_ITEMID = #{itemid} or i.FPARENT = #{itemid})
AND s.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.fwelder_id,w.FNAME,w.FWELDER_NO welderno,i.fname insname,SUM(s.FSTANDBYTIME)/3600 hour FROM TB_STANDBY s INNER JOIN tb_welder w ON s.FWELDER_ID = w.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.FOWNER WHERE 1 = 1
and s.fstarttime >= to_date(#{time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND i.FPARENT = #{parent}
GROUP BY s.fwelder_id,w.FNAME,w.FWELDER_NO,i.fname ORDER BY hour DESC ) WHERE 7 >= ROWNUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT wr.FNAME,sum((w.fworktime*w.fwirefeedrate*m.fcoefficient)/60) wirefeedrate FROM tb_work w LEFT JOIN tb_material_coefficient m ON w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel INNER JOIN TB_WELDER wr ON wr.FID = w.FWELDER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND w.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY w.FWELDER_ID,wr.FNAME ORDER BY wirefeedrate DESC ) WHERE 7 >= ROWNUM

select count(DISTINCT(fmachine_id)) machinenum from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime < date_sub(date_sub(#{time},interval -1 day),interval 0 minute)

select * from (select i.fid,i.fname,SUM(fworktime)/60/60 hour,to_char(fstarttime, 'yyyy-MM-dd') time from tb_insframework i inner join tb_work w on w.fmachine_itemid=i.fid where i.ftype=23
and i.fparent = #{dto.parent}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime
group by i.fid,i.fname,fstarttime )temp

select * from ( select i.fid,i.fname,SUM(w.fwarntime)/60/60 hour,to_char(fstarttime,'yyyy-MM-dd') time from tb_insframework i inner join tb_warn w on w.fmachine_itemid=i.fid where i.ftype=23 and fstatus=99
and i.fparent = #{dto.parent}
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= fendtime
group by i.fid,i.fname,fstarttime )temp

select.if:
SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(t.wkhour) wkhour,sum(t.wnhour) wnhour FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(wk.fworktime)/3600 wkhour,sum(wn.FALARMTIME)/3600 wnhour,i.FPARENT FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_work wk ON wk.fmachine_itemid=i.fid
AND wk.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
LEFT JOIN TB_ALARM wn on wn.fmachine_itemid=i.fid
AND wn.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(wk.fworktime)/3600 wkhour,sum(wn.FALARMTIME)/3600 wnhour FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_work wk ON wk.fmachine_itemid=i.fid
AND wk.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
LEFT JOIN TB_ALARM wn on wn.fmachine_itemid=i.fid
AND wn.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(t.wirefeedrate) wirefeedrate FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(w.fworktime) worktime,i.FPARENT,sum((w.fworktime*w.fwirefeedrate*m.fcoefficient)/60) wirefeedrate FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_work w ON w.FWELDER_ITEMID=i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel WHERE i.FTYPE = 23
AND w.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{time1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY i.fid )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname ORDER BY wirefeedrate desc

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum((wk.fworktime*wk.fwirefeedrate*m.fcoefficient)/60) wirefeedrate,i.FPARENT FROM tb_work wk LEFT JOIN TB_INSFRAMEWORK i ON i.fid=wk.FWELDER_ITEMID LEFT JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on wk.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and wk.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and wk.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel WHERE i.FTYPE = 23
AND wk.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{time1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY i.fid

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,i.FTYPE type,sum(t.hour) hour FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(wk.fworktime)/3600 hour,i.FPARENT FROM tb_work wk LEFT JOIN TB_INSFRAMEWORK i ON i.fid=wk.FWELDER_ITEMID WHERE i.FTYPE = 23
AND wk.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FTYPE ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(wk.fworktime)/3600 hour,i.FPARENT FROM tb_work wk LEFT JOIN TB_INSFRAMEWORK i ON i.fid=wk.FWELDER_ITEMID WHERE i.FTYPE = 23
AND wk.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,i.FTYPE type,sum(t.wkhour) hour,sum(t.num) num FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(sdb.FSTANDBYTIME)/3600 wkhour,i.FPARENT,COUNT(DISTINCT wr.FOWNER) num FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN TB_STANDBY sdb ON sdb.FWELDER_ITEMID=i.fid
AND sdb.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
LEFT JOIN TB_WELDER wr ON i.fid = wr.FOWNER WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FTYPE ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.fid,i.fname,i.FTYPE type,i.FPARENT,sum(sdb.FSTANDBYTIME)/36000 hour,COUNT(DISTINCT wr.FOWNER) num FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN TB_STANDBY sdb ON sdb.FWELDER_ITEMID=i.fid
AND sdb.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
LEFT JOIN TB_WELDER wr ON i.fid = wr.FOWNER WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname,i.FTYPE,i.FPARENT ORDER BY FID

mapper.select:
SELECT fname,sum(weldwire) weldwire,sum(gas) gas from ( select j.fname, 0 weldwire, 0 gas from tb_insframework j LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE j.ftype=23
and (j.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
union all select i.fname, sum((w.fworktime*w.fwirefeedrate*DECODE(m.fcoefficient, NULL, 0 ,m.fcoefficient))/60) weldwire,sum((w.fworktime*w.frateofflow)/60) gas from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent left JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel where 1=1
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
group BY i.fname ) t group BY fname

select count(DISTINCT(fmachine_id)) num,count(DISTINCT(machine)) total,count(DISTINCT(fid)) fid from( select null fmachine_id,null machine,w.fid from tb_welding_machine w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.finsframework_id left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
union all select fmachine_id,fmachine_id machine,null fid from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
UNION all select fmachine_id,null machine,null fid from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
UNION all select fmachine_id,fmachine_id machine,null fid from tb_warn w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)temp

select fid,fname,sum(insid) insid,sum(hour) worktime from( select j.fid,j.fname, 0 insid, 0 hour from tb_insframework j LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE j.ftype=23
and (j.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
union all SELECT j.fid, j.fname insname,SUM(a.fworktime) insid, SUM(a.fworktime) hour FROM tb_insframework j INNER JOIN tb_work a ON j.fid=a.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (j.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY j.fid,j.fname UNION ALL SELECT j.fid, j.fname insname, SUM(a.fwarntime) insid,SUM(a.fwarntime) hour FROM tb_insframework j INNER JOIN tb_warn a ON j.fid=a.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1 and a.fstatus !='99'
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (j.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY j.fid,j.fname UNION ALL SELECT j.fid, j.fname insname, SUM(a.fstandbytime) insid,0 hour FROM tb_insframework j INNER JOIN tb_standby a ON j.fid=a.fmachine_itemid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = j.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and a.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (j.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY j.fid,j.fname )temp group by fid,fname order by fid,fname

SELECT DISTINCT k.FMACHINE_ID fmachineid,k.fname,k.fid from ( SELECT distinct l.FMACHINE_ID,l.fweld_no fname,i.fid FROM tb_live_data l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and l.FWeldTime >= to_date(#{totime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{time2},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= l.FWeldTime
union all SELECT distinct l.FMACHINE_ID,l.fweld_no fname,i.fid FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and l.fstarttime >= to_date(#{time1},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{time1},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= l.fendtime
) k where k.FMACHINE_ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT t.fmachineid FROM tb_taskresult t WHERE 1=1
and t.frealstarttime >= to_date(#{time1},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.frealstarttime <= to_date(#{time2},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)

SELECT * from ( select sum(w.fwarntime) total,i.fname,i.ftype from tb_warn w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY w.fmachine_itemid union all SELECT 0 total,i.fname,i.ftype FROM tb_insframework i left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and i.fid not in (SELECT DISTINCT fmachine_itemid from tb_warn w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where 1=1
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and w.fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
)) t where t.ftype=23 ORDER BY t.total desc

select fname,sum(insid) insid,sum(hour) worktime from( SELECT i.fid,i.fname, 0 insid, 0 hour from tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE i.ftype=23 UNION ALL SELECT i.fid,i.fname,COUNT(j.fid) insid,0 hour FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_welded_junction j ON i.fid=j.fitemId
WHERE fstart_time >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname UNION ALL SELECT i.fid,i.fname,0 insid,COUNT(t.fid) hour FROM tb_insframework i LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_welded_junction j ON i.fid=j.fitemId LEFT JOIN tb_taskresult t ON (j.fid=t.ftaskid AND t.foperatetype=1)
WHERE fstart_time >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname )temp group by fname order by fname

SELECT max(t.name) name,t.machineno machineno, sum(weldwire) weldwire,sum(gas) gas,sum(t.id) id,sum(t.insid) insid from ( select max(i.fname) name,max(w.fweld_no) machineno,sum((w.fworktime*w.fwirefeedrate*DECODE(m.fcoefficient, NULL, 0 ,m.fcoefficient))/60) weldwire, sum((w.fworktime)/60) gas,sum(fworktime)/COUNT(DISTINCT w.FGATHER_NO) id,0 insid from tb_work w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent left JOIN tb_material_coefficient m on w.fmaterialgas = m.fmaterial and w.fwirediameter = m.fdiameter and w.fmachinemodel=m.fmodel where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY fmachine_id UNION select max(i.fname) name,max(w.fweld_no) machineno,0 weldwire,0 gas,0 id,sum(fstandbytime)/COUNT(DISTINCT w.FGATHER_NO) insid from tb_standby w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.fmachine_itemid left JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent left JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent where fmachine_id!=0
and (i.fid=#{itemid} or ins.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fid=#{itemid} or insf.fparent=#{itemid})
and fstarttime >= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and fendtime <= to_date(#{dto.dtoTime2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY fmachine_id ) t GROUP BY t.machineno

SELECT a.FSTARTTIME frealstarttime,w.FNAME,i.FNAME insname,wj.JOB_NUMBER,wj.SET_NUMBER,wj.PART_NAME FROM TB_WORK a INNER JOIN TB_WELDER w ON a.FWELDER_ID = w.FID INNER JOIN TB_INSFRAMEWORK i ON w.FOWNER = i.FID INNER JOIN TB_WELDED_JUNCTION wj ON a.FCARD_ID = wj.FID WHERE wj.FSTATUS = 1 and a.fstatus=99
AND a.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
ORDER BY a.FSTARTTIME
SELECT ELECTRICITY_UPPER electricity FROM TB_PRODUCTION_CRAFT WHERE FJUNCTION = #{fjunctionid}

select.if:
SELECT i.fid,i.fname,sum(t.num) num FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN( SELECT i.FID,i.FNAME,SUM(a.fworktime) num,i.FPARENT FROM TB_INSFRAMEWORK i LEFT JOIN TB_WORK a ON i.FID = a.FWELDER_ITEMID and a.FWPS_LIB_ID > 0 and a.fstatus=99
AND a.fstarttime >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.FID,i.FNAME,i.FPARENT ORDER BY i.FID )t ON t.FPARENT = i.fid WHERE i.FTYPE = 22 GROUP BY i.fid,i.fname ORDER BY FID

SELECT i.FID,i.FNAME,SUM(a.fworktime) num FROM TB_INSFRAMEWORK i LEFT JOIN TB_WORK a ON i.FID = a.FWELDER_ITEMID and a.FWPS_LIB_ID > 0 and a.fstatus=99
AND a.fstarttime >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
WHERE i.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY i.FID,i.FNAME ORDER BY i.FID

mapper.select:
SELECT wj.JOB_NUMBER,wj.SET_NUMBER,SUM(a.FALARMTIME)/3600 wnhour,SUM(w.FWORKTIME)/3600 wkhour FROM TB_WELDED_JUNCTION wj LEFT JOIN TB_ALARM a ON wj.FID = a.FCARD_ID
AND a.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
LEFT JOIN TB_WORK w ON wj.FID = w.FCARD_ID
AND w.FSTARTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
WHERE wj.FSTATUS = 1 and w.FWORKTIME > 0 GROUP BY wj.JOB_NUMBER,wj.SET_NUMBER

SELECT m.FID, m.FNAME, m.NUM, n.NUM total FROM ( SELECT ins.FID, ins.FNAME, ins.FPARENT, SUM(t.num) num FROM TB_INSFRAMEWORK ins LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ins.FID, ins.FNAME, ins.FTYPE, ins.FPARENT, COUNT(w.FOWNER) num FROM TB_INSFRAMEWORK ins LEFT JOIN TB_WELDER w ON ins.FID = w.FOWNER WHERE ins.FTYPE = 22 OR ins.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY ins.FID, ins.FNAME, FTYPE, ins.FPARENT ORDER BY ins.FID ) t ON ins.FID = t.FPARENT WHERE ins.FTYPE = 22 OR ins.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY ins.FID, ins.FNAME, ins.FPARENT ) m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ins.FID, ins.FNAME, ins.FPARENT, COUNT(w.FOWNER) num FROM TB_INSFRAMEWORK ins LEFT JOIN TB_WELDER w ON ins.FID = w.FOWNER WHERE ins.FTYPE = 22 OR ins.FTYPE = 23 GROUP BY ins.FID, ins.FNAME, ins.FPARENT ) n ON m.FID = n.FID ORDER BY m.FID
